column4: guys when I apt-get install wine I get this error that the package has no installation candidate what can I do ?
make sure you have universe enabled
danya try Applications->Add/Remove software and search for it in there
make sure "All available applications" is selected in the top right
are all the boxes ticked on that page?
: I told u yes lol .. I've enebaled them when I 1st used ubuntu
well if you can't find wine its most likely because those aren't enabled properly
